Title: Lace Evening Dress with Open Back

----

Sku: CP807

----

Price:

----

Sizes: 8, 6, 4, 10, 12

Colors: hot-pink

Category: evening

Featured-image: CP807-hot-pink-lace-evening-dress-with-open-back_p.jpg

----

Description: A stunning halter topped lace gown. The asymmetrical look is completed with a high split in the front of the skirt and a peek-a-boo cut out on the side that spreads to the open back. The jeweled belt in the front creates a trim for the skirt in the back.
